name: Wrath Space Arena
description:
Use your magic, Level Up , and resist to the incoming waves using new skills that you will learn every level!

You are a friendly and peaceful guy, you don't want to fight, but sometimes your wrath takes control and you can use super powerful magics.... Until then... Run and save yourself! 

Wrath Space Arena it's a action game, which you play as a mage that switches from rage to peacefulness. Survive all waves dodging enemies while you're calm and building anger, and unleash chaos of spells when your anger matter is full.

Controls:
- WASD for 8-directional movement
- Space to do a roll jump
- Left click to cast a spell (only when you're angry)
- Change your active spell using 1-9, Q-E or the mouse wheel
- Mouse to aim

This game was made during Indie Space Jam, in one week, and the theme was "From 0 to 100"

Peace was never an option, and our little mage has some anger issues that will fuel his powers... until he calms down...
